alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 6:03PM MDT until April 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph will subside this evening before increasing again on Thursday with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Kiowa County, Baca and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible along with areas of blowing dust. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on east west roadways.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
